name: Tetro
description:
Tetro a remake of Tetris adds one new piece and 5 separate piece holders!  The holders are unlocked a you go up in levels.  One holder is automatically unlocked in the beginning.

Controls:

  • E & Q switch between holders
  • R rotates blocks
  • W moves block down
  • A & D Moves blocks left and right
  • Space inserts blocks in holder and replaces blocks from holder
